titleStmt.title: Joyfull newes from the King, or, The True proceedings of His Maties [abbreviated] Armie at Notingham, Lichfield, Tamworth, Warwick, Coventry, Medingham vvherein is declared His Majesties ill successe in all his enterprises being repulsed by my Lo. Brooks and the well affected Protestants of the severall places above mentioned.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
